claims.description: Model cannot be used in violation of fair lending laws and must avoid protected-class proxies.
claims.verification_strategy: Review fairness policy and variable vetting to avoid proxies.
claims.expected_evidence: Compliance notes and excluded feature list preventing proxy variables.

claims.description: Model is validated for U.S. 50 states only, not U.S. territories or international markets.
claims.verification_strategy: Check geography constraints in scope and data filters.
claims.expected_evidence: Docs limiting use to 50 states; code filtering territories/international.

claims.description: Model is valid only for fixed-rate unsecured personal loans with terms 36 or 60 months.
claims.verification_strategy: Confirm product/term constraints enforced in preprocessing/config.
claims.expected_evidence: Config enforcing product type and 36/60-month terms.

claims.description: Model outputs are recommendations, not final decisions; manual overrides and policy rules are required.
claims.verification_strategy: Find decisioning documentation requiring analyst review and policy overlays.
claims.expected_evidence: Decision flow showing human-in-the-loop and policy checks.

claims.description: Model underpredicts portfolio EL by about 0.38% to 0.51%; mitigation includes portfolio-level calibration (+40 bps) and overlays.
claims.verification_strategy: Validate bias range and presence of a +40 bps calibration/overlay step.
claims.expected_evidence: Calibration config applying ~+40 bps and overlay documentation.

claims.description: Small business loans have higher prediction error (1.2%); mitigation includes risk premium, potential separate model, stricter approvals, and enhanced manual review.
claims.verification_strategy: Check segment error stats and mitigation measures for small business loans.
claims.expected_evidence: Segment plan with risk premium, separate-model option, and manual review steps.

claims.description: Performance degradation over time (PD AUC decline) is observed; mitigation includes quarterly AUC and PSI monitoring and planned annual refresh.
claims.verification_strategy: Review monitoring plan for quarterly AUC/PSI and annual refresh schedule.
claims.expected_evidence: Monitoring dashboard plan and refresh cadence documentation.

claims.description: F grade tail risk is poorly estimated due to limited volume; mitigation includes conservative policy, pricing premiums, manual review, and possibly removing F from approvals.
claims.verification_strategy: Inspect policy for conservative treatment/pricing and potential F-grade exclusion.
claims.expected_evidence: Policy addendum setting higher premiums or removal criteria for F grade.

claims.description: Missing data (e.g., months since last delinquency 48.4% missing) may introduce bias; mitigation includes sensitivity analysis and separate monitoring of missing segments.
claims.verification_strategy: Confirm missingness rates, sensitivity analyses, and monitoring by missing segments.
claims.expected_evidence: QA report quantifying missingness and sensitivity/segment monitoring outputs.

claims.description: No macro scenario capability; mitigation includes separate macro overlay framework and management overlays for CECL.
claims.verification_strategy: Check for documented macro overlay framework and CECL overlay governance.
claims.expected_evidence: Overlay methodology doc and governance approvals.

claims.description: Internal validation was performed by the development team during model construction in October 2025.
claims.verification_strategy: Locate internal validation checklist/results dated October 2025.
claims.expected_evidence: Validation notes or report signed off by dev team.

claims.description: Independent validation has NOT yet been performed; required before production use.
claims.verification_strategy: Verify absence of independent validator report and policy requirement.
claims.expected_evidence: MRM policy stating requirement and current status as pending.

claims.description: Independent validator must be separate from model development and have credit risk expertise.
claims.verification_strategy: Check validator role definition and independence criteria.
claims.expected_evidence: Governance doc specifying org separation and expertise requirements.

claims.description: Validation scope includes conceptual soundness, data quality, performance, implementation, documentation, model risk, and monitoring plan.
claims.verification_strategy: Review validation scope checklist/template covering all listed domains.
claims.expected_evidence: Validation plan including the full scope enumerated.

claims.description: Planned validation timeline: independent validation start November 2025; report January 2026; committee review February 2026; potential production approval March 2026.
claims.verification_strategy: Find project plan with these milestone dates.
claims.expected_evidence: Gantt/plan or memo listing the milestone schedule.

claims.description: Outcomes analysis will be performed after 12+ months of production use and then quarterly and annually thereafter.
claims.verification_strategy: Check monitoring framework for outcomes analysis cadence (12+ months, quarterly/annual).
claims.expected_evidence: Monitoring policy specifying post-deployment outcomes analysis cadence.

claims.description: Benchmark comparison claims current model outperforms previous model on PD AUC (0.688 vs 0.665) and on LGD/EAD/EL MAE.
claims.verification_strategy: Locate benchmark section comparing prior vs current model across metrics.
claims.expected_evidence: Comparison table showing AUC/MAE improvements vs prior model.

claims.description: Model is designed for Python 3.9+ and tested on Python 3.10.x and 3.11.x.
claims.verification_strategy: Check pyproject/requirements and CI matrix for supported/tested versions.
claims.expected_evidence: Environment docs and CI config indicating these versions.

claims.description: Core dependencies include numpy, pandas, scikit-learn, scipy, joblib, matplotlib, seaborn, openpyxl, xlsxwriter, python-dateutil, pytz, typing-extensions.
claims.verification_strategy: Inspect requirements.txt/lockfile and import usage.
claims.expected_evidence: Dependency file listing the named packages.

claims.description: Container environment uses python:3.10.12-slim-bullseye on Debian 11 with Docker and optionally Kubernetes.
claims.verification_strategy: Review Dockerfile/base image and deployment notes mentioning Kubernetes.
claims.expected_evidence: Container spec referencing python:3.10.12-slim-bullseye and K8s option.
